title: Chella Magale Song Lyrics Tamil & English Meaning | Jana Nayagan

sections.intro: The soul-stirring melody Chella Magale from the movie Jananayagan is a beautiful tribute to the bond between a parent and daughter. With its gentle orchestration and evocative lyrics, this track stands out as an emotional masterpiece. Explore the deep poetic layers of this lullaby-style anthem below.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • The phrase 'Kodi nilavugal' (ten million moons) is a classical Tamil poetic exaggeration used to describe divine beauty, repurposed here for paternal/maternal love.
  • The music video's soft lighting and intimate framing mirror the 'Lullaby' (Thalattu) genre of Tamil cinema, emphasizing the protective nature of the protagonist.
  • The line 'Ulagathukkae kadhavadaippom' (We will shut the door to the world) hints at a plot point in Jananayagan where the parent and child are isolated or on the run.

Frequently Asked Questions

What does 'Naani naadha' mean in the song?

It is a poetic variation referring to a 'pure sound' or 'primordial vibration,' signifying that the child is the fundamental harmony of the parent's life.

Is Chella Magale a sad song?

No, it is an uplifting and emotional melody celebrating the joy of parenthood, though it carries a deeply protective and sentimental tone.

englishStanzas:
Kodi nilavugal varum azhaghae
Kodi kavidhaigal tharum porulae
Kodi varamellamae oru pillaiyanadhen
Siru siru sirippellamae
ennai vazha cholludhe

[Oh beauty, you are the glow of ten million moons. You are the essence of ten million poems. It feels as if ten million boons have taken the form of one child; your tiny smiles tell me to keep living.]

Kannae maniyae kannimaiyae
En kaikulla malarndhavalae
Enthan nenjil kudiyirukkum
Naani naadha en uyirae

[My dear eye, my precious gem, my very eyelid! You are the one who blossomed within my arms. Living deep within my heart, you are my lifeтАЩs purest sound.]

Needhaane enakellamae
En chella magalae

[You are everything to me, my darling daughter.]

Unna neengaadhu ennoda kaalgal
Unna kondaada undaana tholgal
Siru vizhiyaal kadha kadhaya nee pesa venum
Ulagathukkae kadhavadaippom neeyum naanum
Keikkaamale unakkunnu thara uyir irukkudhu

[My feet will never leave your side; my shoulders were made just to celebrate (carry) you. You must speak stories upon stories with your tiny eyes. You and I shall shut the door to the rest of the world; I have a life ready to give you, even without you asking.]
